citing_context: For example , national study parents high school students , almost tenth parents ( 9 % ) reported firearm - related incident occurred child 's school within past 5 years ( e.g. , student found with gun on campus , bullet found , student threatened peers with guns , etc . )
cited_abs: Firearm violence remains significant problem US ( with 2787 adolescents killed 2015 ) . However , research on school firearm violence prevention practices and policies scant . Parents major stakeholders relation firearm violence by youths and school safety general . purpose study examine parents thought schools should reduce risk firearm violence schools . valid and reliable questionnaire mailed national random sample 600 parents who least one child enrolled public secondary school ( response rate=47 % ) . Parents perceived inadequate parental monitoring / rearing practices ( 73 % ) , peer harassment and/or bullying ( 58 % ) , inadequate mental health care services for youth ( 54 % ) , and easy access guns ( 51 % ) major causes firearm violence schools . school policies perceived most effective reducing firearm violence installing alert system schools ( 70 % ) , working with law enforcement design emergency response plan ( 70 % ) , creating comprehensive security plan ( 68 % ) , requiring criminal background checks for all school personnel prior hiring ( 67 % ) , and implementing anonymous system for students report peer concerns regarding potential violence ( 67 % ) . Parents seem have limited grasp potentially effective interventions reduce firearm violence .

citing_context: transformer models
cited_abs: dominant sequence transduction models based on complex recurrent or convolutional neural networks include encoder and decoder . best performing models also connect encoder and decoder through attention mechanism . propose new simple network architecture , Transformer , based solely on attention mechanisms , dispensing with recurrence and convolutions entirely . Experiments on two machine translation tasks show models superior quality while more parallelizable and requiring significantly less time train . model achieves 28.4 BLEU on WMT 2014 Englishto - German translation task , improving existing best results , including ensembles , by 2 BLEU . On WMT 2014 English - - French translation task , model establishes new single - model state - - - art BLEU score 41.8 after training for 3.5 days on eight GPUs , small fraction training costs best models literature . show Transformer generalizes well other tasks by applying successfully English constituency parsing both with large and limited training data .

citing_context: SWEET - HOME [ 21 ] nationally supported French research project aims design new smart home system based on audio technology . project three main goals : providing audio - based interaction technology lets users have full control home environment , detecting distress situations and easing social inclusion elderly and frail population
cited_abs: Smart homes equipped with ambient intelligence technology constitute promising direction enable growing number elderly continue live own home long possible . However , calls for technological solutions suit specific needs and capabilities .   SWEET - HOME   project aims developing new user friendly technology for home automation based on voice command . paper reports user evaluation assessing acceptance and fear new technology . Eight healthy persons between 71 and 88   years old , 7 relatives ( child , grandchild or friend ) and 3 professional carers participated user evaluation . During about 45 min , persons questioned co - discovery   DOMUS   smart home alternating between interview and wizard Oz periods followed by debriefing . experience aimed testing four important aspects project : voice command , communication with outside world , domotics system interrupting person ’s activity , and electronic agenda . Voice interface appeared have great potential ease daily living for elderly and frail persons and would better accepted than more intrusive solutions . By considering still healthy and independent elderly people user evaluation , interesting finding came up overall acceptance provided system not drive lazy lifestyle by taking control everything . particular fear must addressed for development smart homes support daily living by giving more ability control rather than putting away daily routine .
